text:
Hi all!
I am creating one module with some fields. How I can compare two string values in display conditions? I need OR condition with regex option I think…
this is something that has been bothering me for a while – syntax highlighting for `set` and `import` inside of `{# hubl comments #}`
We have an open issue to address this actually - thanks for pointing it out

Any way to create a form in HubSpot, but make it expire/hide the form if 100 people have submitted it already? Basically to put a cap on the submissions and show different content if that has happened.
not sure but maybe it can be done using workflows? completely just throwing that idea out there, no idea if it’s remotely possible.

I have basically only seen ways to expire content at a certain date. I was trying to see if I put a smart content block but I don't know that I have seen a way to say "do this when x amount of people are on this list"
can certainly do it by date, I’ve just never seen someone do it by how many subscribed

yeah I was trying to even see, if every time a form submission was sent. to send an email with the # of contacts on a list. (and once I get notified there is 100 I can go manually expire it for instance) But I don't think that is possible either.
